translations: n．集体：一群共同追求某种目标或共享某种特征的人。
· The collectivities of workers are demanding better working conditions.
工人集体要求更好的工作条件。

sentences.sentence: I can converse with him about individuals and collectivities with whom we are not at present in face-to-face interaction.
sentences.translation: 我可以和他谈论当下并不和我们互动的其他个体或群体。
